name: UpdateSimplePrices
description:
Update the prices in the pricelist specified.

This service takes a simplified approach of the pricing tools EVA offers, but that limits the options you have available. The price list to update may
only have a single active adjustment, and that has to be of type `MANUAL_INPUT`.

* The pricelist is identified by the `PriceListID` or the `BackendSystemID` and `BackendID`.
* Products can be identified by their (EVA) `ID`.
* Updates from this service are persisted in the background, which could take up to 15 minutes to process (unless you set `ForcePriceListRecalculation` to `true`)
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `UpdateSimplePrices:None`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-BackendSystemID
headers.description: The ID of the backend system that is used to resolve the IDs.

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "ForcePriceListRecalculation": true,
  "PriceListBackendID": "string",
  "PriceListBackendSystemID": "string",
  "PriceListID": 123,
  "Prices": [
    {
      "BackendID": "string",
      "CustomID": "string",
      "NewPrice": 123.456,
      "ProductID": 123
    }
  ],
  "SkipPriceListRecalculation": true
}' \
  https://euw.acme.test.eva-online.cloud/message/UpdateSimplePrices

C.name: BackendID
C.deprecation_notice:
**Deprecated since 812:** BackendID is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.856: Use the `External-IDs` mode header and the `ID` parameter.

**Will be removed in 838**
C.description:
**Deprecated since 812:** BackendID is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.856: Use the `External-IDs` mode header and the `ID` parameter.

**Will be removed in 838**

C.name: CustomID
C.deprecation_notice:
**Deprecated since 812:** CustomID is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.856: No longer supported - switch to `ProductID` either with an (EVA) `ID` or a `BackendID` through the `External-IDs` mode header..

**Will be removed in 838**
C.description:
**Deprecated since 812:** CustomID is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.856: No longer supported - switch to `ProductID` either with an (EVA) `ID` or a `BackendID` through the `External-IDs` mode header..

**Will be removed in 838**

C.name: NewPrice
C.description: Leave empty to delete the price for this product

C.name: ProductID
C.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

B.name: ForcePriceListRecalculation
B.description: Set this to `true` when an immediate persistance of these prices is required. Not recommended; background recalculation is usually done within 15 minutes.

B.name: PriceListID
B.description: This is the ID of a `PriceList`

B.name: SkipPriceListRecalculation
B.deprecation_notice:
**Deprecated since 812:** SkipPriceListRecalculation is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.856: This parameter will be removed and default to `true`, use `ForcePriceListRecalculation` if an immediate price list recalculation is required..

**Will be removed in 838**
B.description:
Set this to `true` when an immediate persistance of these prices is not needed (eg. when batching multiple calls). Background recalculation is usually done within 15 minutes.

**Deprecated since 812:** SkipPriceListRecalculation is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.856: This parameter will be removed and default to `true`, use `ForcePriceListRecalculation` if an immediate price list recalculation is required..

**Will be removed in 838**

E.name: Code
E.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

E.name: Message
E.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

E.name: RequestID
E.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

E.name: Type
E.description: A short description of the error type.

F.name: ExternalIDs
F.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

F.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
F.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

F.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
F.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
